short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ATEEZ Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD ATEEZ background. ATEEZ wallpaper background themes for K-pop fans.
short.ja: ATEEZ壁紙拡張機能はATEEZ壁紙HD背景で新しいタブページを変更します。 ATEEZのためのテーマ。
short.ko: ATEEZ 배경 화면 확장은 ATEEZ 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. ATEEZ 팬을위한 테마.
short.zh_CN: ATEEZ壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为ATEEZ的背景壁纸。ATEEZ的主题。
short.zh_TW: ATEEZ壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為ATEEZ的背景壁紙。ATEEZ粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle ATEEZ wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize ATEEZ background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Get easy access to popular sites with Google search.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in ATEEZ new tab.
